StatDef.label: Integrity
StatDef.description: This characteristic shows how strong or weak the item is for improvement with the Archotech instructions. The higher this value, the more or stronger improvements can be printed. Each print of instruction reduces it.

StatDef.label: Instruction list
StatDef.description: The number and list of instructions already printed on the thing (or on all worn apparel and primary weapon, if is for a pawn).
